headline: Comcast Earnings Are Nearly Here. This Number Is Key.
summary: Comcast  stock is on a bad run, but second-quarter earnings on Thursday could spark a much-needed turnaround.  Analysts expect NBCUniversal’s parent to report an adjusted profit of $1.16 a share on revenue of $29.8 billion, according to FactSet.  Last quarter, Comcast opened its Universal Epic Universe theme park in Orlando, Florida, but broadband subscriptions probably will be the focus for investors when the company reports its numbers.

headline: This Early Telltale Sign Yielded 38% Gain For Netflix In Two Months
summary: When picking stocks, there is no sure way to know which stocks are going to be the big winners ahead of time.  Fundamental strength is one indicator.  PepsiCo, and McDonald's fell in February 2022 despite steady sales and earnings growth.

headline: 1 Mega-Cap Stock to Own for Decades and 2 Facing Challenges
summary: Megacap stocks dominate their sectors and their actions influence economies worldwide. The flip side though is that their sheer size means they have less room for explosive growth as scale works against them.

raw.headline: 1 Mega-Cap Stock to Own for Decades and 2 Facing Challenges
